name: Tasbeeh Counter 7 Lataif Zikir Meditation App for Sufis
name_original: Tasbeeh Counter 7 Lataif Zikir Meditation App for Sufis
description:
Zikir Tasbeeh Application for Android Phones

Step1 : 

Download the apkfile in your android mobile.

Install

open and start doing zikir

Features

this zikir is a teaching of awaited messiah, Imam mehdi Riaz ahmed Gohar shahi and his representative younus al gohar of Messiah Foundation

2) Main Menu has a General Tasbeeh / Counter  for General Zikir of your choice

2) you can select Each Lataif (spirit) for its corresponding zikir. you must recite them 101 times to make 1 Noor (devine light of god)

On  counting a zikir to 101 times and receiving noor, your mobile will vibrate. this function is added so that when a seeker is doing zikir with eyes closed he doesnt need to look at the screen and break his meditation. the phone will vibrate at every 101 times

for all seven Lataif (spirit) when counter reach 101 it will reset to 0

General Zikir Tasbeeh (counter)  at Main Menu will continue counting untill you reset yourself

There is also a bonus Allah Hu zikir 

All 7 Lataif zikir and allahu zikir will play Audio on pressing the button.  the audio is played by the Representative of Imam Mehdi, CEO of messiah foundation "Younus al Gohar"
